scripts.apis:start: cd apis && npm run start:dev && cd ../
scripts.apis:migrate: cd apis && npm run migrate && cd ../
scripts.apis:format: cd apis && npm run format && cd ../
scripts.apis:format:fix: cd apis && npm run format:fix && cd ../
scripts.apis:lint: cd apis && npm run lint && cd ../
scripts.apis:test: cd apis && npm run test && cd ../
scripts.apis:test:cov: cd apis && npm run test:cov && cd ../
scripts.apis:test:e2e: cd apis && npm run test:e2e && cd ../
scripts.client:start: cd client && npm run start && cd ../
scripts.client:build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.client:test: cd client && npm run test && cd ../
scripts.server:start: cd server && npm run start && cd ../
